entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET 7 Blazor WASM authentication back button history behavior still problematic with 3rd party IDP #45097
  • Blazor Value cannot be null. (Parameter 'obj') #45096
  • .Net 7 - Json Serialization Case issue #45094
  • Resolve ambiguous parameter name `context` using the closest one #45092
  • Allow QuickGrid columns to be put in user-defined razor components. #45088
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Connections.ConnectionResetException #45086
  • WithSummary and WithDescription deson't work in minimal api #45082
  • Blazor: Navigation.BaseUri Incorrect on Forwarded Ports #45081
  • ASP .NET CORE Custom Middleware #45080
  • There was no runtime pack for Microsoft.AspNetCore.App available for the specified RuntimeIdentifier 'browser-wasm'. #45078
  • Update template metadata for net8 #45077
  • UsePathBase does not work as expected in .NET 6 #45076
  • Net7 Blazor webassembly does not work with dotnet watch #45074
  • [.net 7] Inject HostedService into another HostedService? #45071
  • Conflicting assembly reference causing the application to break #45068
    Discussions
  • IHttpContextAccessor.HttContext Session throws Exception when not enabled #45067

Closed

  • Kestrel picks a docker generated certificate 'in front' of a generated developer certificate #44685
  • Documentation for NavigationManager.RedirectToLogin suggests it performs log out #45089
  • DefaultAuthenticationConfigurationProvider has new dependency on IConfiguration #44966
    8.0-preview1
  • App fails to process request and returns 503/404 when URL has more than 1 slash #42751
    6.0.12
  • Blazor WebAssembly KeyboardEventArgs keys Unidentified on mobile browsers #45046
  • Unhandled exception rendering component: Cannot read properties of null (reading 'insertBefore') #45034
  • QuickGrid: Cant Add AuthorizeView inside TemplateColumn #45057
  • QuickGrid: when navigating from the page hosting the grid , it calls grid Items , casing "A second operation was started on this context instance before ..." #45059
  • [BUG] Quick grid does not render in .net 7 blazor server project. #45061
  • Add HttpConnectAttribute #43501
    .NET 8 Planning
  • ERROR java.security.cert.CertificateException: java.security.cert.CertPathValidatorException: Trust anchor for certification path not found #44837
  • CSS Isolation: ability to use root scope #45072
  • Upgrading from 6.0.11 to Microsoft.Aspnetcore.Signalr.Client 7.0 introduced System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException #45012
  • Blazor server .net template not work on ios safari #44914
  • Perf regression: fortunes, multiple_queries, plaintext_actix #45020

PullRequests

Created

  • Support checking for required members in minimal APIs #45084
  • Endpoint filter pipeline now returns EmptyHttpResult in case of 400 BadRequest #45073
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks

Merged

  • Nullable cleanup #43451
    area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview1
  • Annotate WebAssembly.Authentication for nullability #43442
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview1
  • [release/7.0] Fix predicate evaluation in OutputCacheAttribute #45027
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime
  • Fixed docs in NavigationManagerExtensions suggesting login operations perform logouts #45090
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • Don't require configuration for Auth #45095
    area-security, 8.0-preview1
  • [6.0] Restore IISServerSetupFilter server type check #45036
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 6.0.12
  • [release/7.0] Add init-nuget workaround back #45091
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 7.0.1
  • [7.0] Match strangely formatted PathBase in HttpSys & IIS #42751 #45008
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 7.0.1
  • [main] Match strangely formatted PathBase in HttpSys & IIS #42751 #45011
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `57bf5a0` to `8c9078b` #45069
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • [Blazor] Workaround linker regression #45028
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor
  • Bump socket.io-parser from 4.0.4 to 4.0.5 in /src/SignalR/clients/ts/FunctionalTests #44985
    area-signalr, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies, 8.0-preview1
  • Bump minimatch from 3.0.4 to 3.1.2 in /src/Components/WebAssembly/WebAssembly.Authentication/src/Interop #45054
    area-blazor, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies, 8.0-preview1
  • Bump minimatch from 3.0.4 to 3.1.2 in /src/Components/WebAssembly/Authentication.Msal/src/Interop #45055
    area-blazor, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies, 8.0-preview1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `a4f02ef` to `912db74` #45070
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • Add OnPrepareResponseAsync #45062
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Bump SDK to 8.0.100-alpha.1.22562.2 #44925
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix SiteExtension loading on App Service #44987
    area-runtime
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2044808 #44686
    area-infrastructure
  • gRPC JSON transcoding - msbuild includes proto dependencies #44999
    area-grpc
  • Add analyzer and code fix to recommend against IHeaderDictionary.Add #44463
    area-runtime, community-contribution
